Thanks for this, but can someone please help me please? I've never had problems with patching but since I updated to this version I've kept receiving this message upon IDM starting:

Internet Download Manager has been registered with a fake Serial Number. Be aware that the cracked product may work incorrectly and download files with errors. Thus we advise you to purchase the full-featured product.

It shows it for about 10 seconds then IDM just shuts down. I've done a clean install, used that uninstall registration reg, done a system restore... everything...! 
:(

Hi, I found a solution. 
Find this version of the latest build:
IDM.6.04.Build.2.Fixed.PROPER-REA

The IDMan.exe provided in the archive curves this problem, but I believe it'll mess up if updated to a newer version.
